row.function: getInteger(message = "Input an integer: ", errorMsg = "Not an integer, Try again.")
row.desc: Prompts user for an input in console, and only returns once it is an int. (Returns the int). Optional parameters for the propt message and the error message.

row.function: getFloat(message = "Input an number: ", errorMsg = "Not an number, Try again.")
row.desc: Prompts user for an input in console, and only returns once it is an float. (Returns the float). Optional parameters for the propt message and the error message.
Prompts user for input, and returns input as a string.
Returns true if prime, if not returns false.
Returns a list of primes up to a given number, using the Sieve of Eratosthenes.
Given a list of numbers, returns a list of only the primes.
Given a dictionary, returns the keys as a list.
Given some number of lists, returns one list with all the values merged.
Merges some number of list in numerical / alphabetical order in a merge sort fashion, returning one list. Lists must only contain either strings or numbers, not both.
Given some list, returns the list without duplicates.
Given a list of numbers, returns the median.
Given a list of numbers, returns the range.
Given a list of numbers, returns the average.
